title: "Lushes" sugarsweet script
content:
I am trying to identify the name of this font. I have inserted a same jpeg that I got off the site where I have a tutorial to do a graphics tag in Paint Shop Pro. The url for the tag is: [http://sweetestharmony.com/Swanny/peaceout/peaceout.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010056/http:/sweetestharmony.com/Swanny/peaceout/peaceout.html "http://sweetestharmony.com/Swanny/peaceout/peaceout.html")  
It is supposed to be a font called Hibiscus but when I do an internet search for that font is is not the same one used here. Anyone know what this font is. Please check out the url for a looka at the whole graphic.

Thanks in advance for any help!  
Nan

 [‹ Spankrock logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010056/http:/typophile.com/node/19291 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Hans" thin and odd sans - Peignot (customised) {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010056/http:/typophile.com/node/19330 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nan

comments.content:
Ye gods that site is so sugary it’s making my teeth hurt!

No the font is not hibiscus.
